packages.name: hero-filekit
packages.description: A node.js file manipulation toolkit for performing advanced operations on files and directories.

functions.function_summary: Search for a specific file extension within a directory and its subdirectories, returning a list of matched file paths.
Renames multiple files in a directory using a specified naming pattern, maintaining their file extensions.
Calculates the total size of a directory, including all files and subdirectories.
